biography.title: Personal Description
biography.value: Youthful and bright-eyed. Wears fashionable clothing.

biography.title: Ideology & Beliefs
biography.value: Strong faith in God, having been raised in the Church by her mother.

biography.title: Significant People
biography.value: Her mother, Joyce, who she writes to every week.

biography.title: Meaningful Locations
biography.value: Her mother's home in Boston, where the best possible food is served.

biography.title: Traits
biography.value: Risk taker. Likes to be in the middle of the action.
